action.action-desc: Mr. Meadows (for himself and Mr. Butterfield) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To clarify that nonprofit organizations such as Habitat for Humanity can accept donated mortgage appraisals, and for other purposes.

section.header: Exemption from Truth in Lending Act
section.text: Section 129E(i) of the Truth in Lending Act (15 U.S.C. 1639e(i)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.header: Rule of construction related to appraisal donations
paragraph.text: For purposes of paragraph (1), if a fee appraiser voluntarily donates appraisal services to an organization eligible to receive tax-deductible charitable contributions, such voluntary donation shall be deemed customary and reasonable.
